description:
"Tabby Slimes In Mushroom Forest by Anton Kurbatov"

- Resolution: 1920*1080.
- Original Artwork: https://www.deviantart.com/antonkurbatov/art/Tabby-Slimes-In-Mushroom-Forest-722051219.
- You can toggle a letterbox and rain.
- I recommend using the "cover" alignment for this wallpaper.
- This isn't a loop, everything is rendered in real-time within the Wallpaper Engine application, you're just watching a .gif preview.
- My website: https://windowscustomization.com/
title: "Tabby Slimes In Mushroom Forest" by Anton Kurbatov
